name: CAToru
description:
The more you have, the worse it is.

This game is about feeding your cat.

Toru, the cat, has six stages of transformation. Be careful about the amount of fish you feed him, but be aware of the amount of time you leave the cat without food. There has to be a balance between the processes. Otherwise, you might lose the accumulated points.

TAP...

TAP...

TAP...

on the screen to give out as much fish as you want.

Don't overthink the message, it's just a game.

Or overthink it. It's just your own choice.
